title: Autofill protected stops working when the game is disbanded.
body: When you get in a lobby someone leaves and it puts you in another lobby why is my autofill protected ignored for the 2nd lobby?

replies.body: Its happened to me twice in a row that i remember, can't really say how consistent it is, its hard to really test just thought it was abit strange.
That sounds really weird! Are you able to consistently reproduce this, or did this only happen once?
